Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Extensor pollicis brevis Radius (posterior)
IO membrane		 Base of 1st proximal phalanx Radial n.
C7 - C8		 Radiocarpal joint: Radial dev.
1st CMC & MCP: Extension
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Distal posterior Radius @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - IO membrane @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Base 1st Metacarpal @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Posterior Interosseous N.]({{< var ref-posterior-interosseous-nerve.path >}}) ([C7]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c7 >}}), [C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **Wrist**: Extension, Radial deviation @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Thumb**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
